Title: No.001
Content: \nMember of Gray Raven. Attacker.\nExpert in engineering. Wields dual guns in combat. Skilled at various firearms and finding enemy weaknesses, also good at construction and maintenance.

Title: No.002
Content:
"Leave the Iso-Device to me."
Known for high intelligence and exceptional computing ability, with a data storage capacity far exceeding normal Constructs. Responsible for the setup of Iso-Devices and the maintenance of Gray Raven equipment.
Also familiar with Construct repair and maintenance.

Title: No.003
Content:
"Perhaps your intelligence quotient is no worse than the average human."
Has a sharp and biting tongue that cuts to the heart of the matter, but seems to have a hard time conveying words of kindness and affection.
His intentions should be understood through action, not through words.

Title: No.004
Content:
"Brother? Er... I mean..."
Seems to have complicated thoughts about being called "Brother."
Seems to be unconcerned about anything other than the mission at hand, but is silently observant of everything.

He was injured when he put himself in harm's way to protect Liv from the Corrupted Tifa.
Despite his unconcerned attitude, his care for his comrades is apparent.

Title: No.005
Content:
"I'd like for you to live safe and sound. Just that."
Formerly the consciousness of the human Morian, he volunteered to join the Construct program as an experimental subject in order to save his brother.
His human heart now beats within his brother's chest.
His overall ability ranks at the top of his Construct class.

Title: No.006
Content:
"Your little tricks will not work."
The seeds of corruption were planted when he put himself in harm's way to protect Liv from Tifa's attack. He almost fell to Tifa's control when they met again in battle, but Lee's preventive measures were able to save him and turn the tide.
A trustworthy and loyal Construct.

Title: No.001
Content:
Leader of Gray Raven. Attacker.
An outstanding soldier, committed to eliminating the infection and paving the way for humanity's return.
Wields a katana. In burst mode, she launches a flurry of attackers by forming twin energy blades.

Title: No.002
Content:
"Permission to engage the enemy."
Absolutely loyal to the mission, carrying out orders calmly and efficiently. Has a tendency to ignore her own safety in combat.

Title: No.003
Content:
One of the first batches of military Constructs.
No crisis will faze this veteran of countless battles.
Suppresses surging emotions to prevent them from affecting the war.

Title: No.004
Content:
Seems to have had her memory wiped for unknown reasons.
Fragments of memory floats up to the surface from time to time. In between missions, Lucia can be seen lost in thought.

Title: No.005
Content:
As a human, all Lucia and her sister Luna had were each other.
Their parents were killed by the Punishing virus.
Her only wish is for a peaceful life with her sister.
Seems to like frog plushies.

Title: No.006
Content: \nAppears to have a past with the Ascendants.\n

Title: No.001
Content:
"Don't...don't look at me like this..."
Member of Gray Raven. Support type.
Skilled at tactical analysis and Construct repair, she operates in support of Gray Raven's operations.
Shy and introverted, combat is not her strong suit, but with Gray Raven being constantly short-handed, she has stepped up to the frontlines and is working to improve her skills.

Title: No.002
Content:
"I'll work hard!"
Kind and gentle, Liv always works hard to help others and make them happy.
She feels fortunate to be around friends and comrades whom she respects greatly.

Title: No.003
Content: \nLiv's kind and pure nature also makes her susceptible to deception and pain. She has a stubbornly altruistic streak which can put her in harm's way.\nGray Raven and the commandant have helped keep her gentle nature unscathed.

Title: No.004
Content:
"Don't go by yourself, Karenina!"
Having parted then reunited with the commandant, Liv has grown from a young and naive girl into a dependable team member.
She did not panic even when Karenina lost control of herself, and was able to give advice with a calm, steady head.

Title: No.005
Content: \nAs a human, Liv was the daughter of a high-ranking medical conglomerate executive. Volunteering for service in the medical corps, she was made into a Construct after she was critically injured trying to save others.

Title: No.006
Content: \nLiv has trained long and hard under the Gray Raven commandant to overcome her weakness in battle.\nToday, she is a reliable and trusted member of Gray Raven.

Title: No.001
Content: \nLeader of the Purifying Force, Attacker.\nAlways cool and logical, Bianca's remarkable skill with a bow is nothing compared to her ability to see the big picture and make the right decision.

Title: No.002
Content: \nThe leader of the Purifying Force may have a reputation for being cold and impersonal, but those close to her know that she is remarkably fair and reasonable, willing to listen to different opinions before making a decision, and quite capable of being flexible when the situation calls for it.\nHer fairness is a great strength, but can sometimes be a source of headaches as well.

Title: No.003
Content:
She has served in her position for a long time, while those of serve under her come and go quickly.
Friend and trusted comrade of Karenina.
She firmly believes that the mission of the Purifying Force is to free infected Constructs from the pain of the Punishing Virus.

Title: No.004
Content: \nIn the hunt for the "deserter" Kamui, she was able to see through the ruse of her mission orders, and worked with Gray Raven to achieve a breakthrough.

Title: No.005
Content:
As a human, Bianca was an abandoned infant raised by the priest of a remote church.
Bianca grew up with a strong sense of faith and self-discipline.
She recognizes her own guilt, but continues to be devoted to her cause to count up the sins of others.

Title: No.006
Content: \nBianca never makes a decision rashly, preferring to thoroughly investigate every case that she handles. This attitude has earned her the contempt of other Purifying Force squads.\nEven so, she remains committed to her position, working to maintain balance between the Purifying Force and the Execution Squads.

Title: No.001
Content:
Nanami, Tank-type.
Records pertaining to her have been lost, and little is known about her at this time other than that she is undoubtedly a Construct.
Despite her short frame, one should never estimate the power of the chainsaw that she wields.

Title: No.002
Content: \nCompletely unpredictable in thought and action, Nanami has an unbound sense of curiosity. She can be an extremely valuable team member, or troublemaker in equal measure.\nHer mercurial nature means that her actions are often determined by her current mood.

Title: No.003
Content:
"Nanami's the king of the world, baby."

A true hacker-girl, all computer systems are naked before her. She can even communicate with mechanoids and the Corrupted.
She has once butted heads with Team Cerberus, one of Babylonia's Execution Squads. While the details of the incident are unknown, the report indicates that she more than held her own against an entire elite squad.

Title: No.004
Content:
Filled with curiosity about anything to do with humans.
Obsessed with the commandant of Gray Raven.
Human commandants from other squads do not seem to pique her interest.

Title: No.005
Content:
A digital diary exists of a girl named Nanami.
The Construct Nanami also seems to be carrying a digital diary.
Aside from this information, Nanami is a giant mystery sack. Where does Nanami come from? What is Nanami? Where is Nanami going? Nobody knows.

Title: No.006
Content: \nWith strong likes and dislikes, and a tendency to act upon her feelings, Nanami's behavior is much more human-like than the other Constructs.\nShe is direct and eager in expressing her emotions, but it remains to be seen if she truly understands the emotions that she speaks of.

Title: No.001
Content: \nMember of Strike Hawk, Tank-type.\nWith strong defense and a great sword as his weapon, he relies on power rather than speed. He favors charging into the fray to disrupt the enemy formation, and can frequently be seen on the frontlines.

Title: No.002
Content:
Always has a smile on his face. Optimistic and direct, his approach is always simple, and he never hesitates to speak his mind.
This naturally brings him into conflict with Lee, who prefers to think things over carefully.
Despite their frequent verbal spars, Lee and Kamui's relationship does not seem at all unfriendly.

Title: No.003
Content:
"Affiliation? That's a headache..."
Though Kamui is a member of Strike Hawk, his assignments have led to him spending most of his time with Gray Raven.
He once said that he would be willing to lay down his life for Gray Raven, if need be.

Title: No.004
Content:
Despite his frame being the newest model developed by Babylonia, records indicate that Kamui was one of the earliest Constructs to be put into service.
Files pertaining to Kamui's consciousness are considered level-2 classified information.
The publicly accessible information on Kamui pertains only to his mechanical and tactical specifications.

Title: No.005
Content: \nKamui and Camu are linked by the M.I.N.D., but it is unknown whether Kamui knew about Camu's existence from the beginning or not.\nAs for the relationship between Kamui and Camu, there is no way to know except to wait for the day that the files are unclassified.

Title: No.006
Content: \nWhat is behind Kamui's smile?\nParadoxes and struggles lie beneath his warm and honest words. His struggles with self, the memories forgottenâ€”perhaps there will be a commandant who can get to the bottom of it.

Title: No.001
Content: \nSupport associated with the Purifying Force. Attacker-type.\nWielding a hand cannon, she is an expert in demolition and explosives. Even with performance limits imposed, her ability in combat is second to none, even elite Constructs in the Execution Squad.

Title: No.002
Content: \nSees Lucia as her greatest rival, constantly seeking the opportunity to avenge the defeat that she once suffered at Lucia's hands, but Lucia has always been able to find a reason to avoid it.

Title: No.003
Content: \nAs a regular support associate of the Purifying Force, she often works with Bianca.\nThey worked together to pursue Kamui.

Title: No.004
Content:
Karenina's fiery temper and obsession with winning have led to many conflicts.
However, it is also very easy to redirect her attention and calm her down.
Bianca, in particular, has become something of an expert at this.

Title: No.005
Content:
Karenina's consciousness came from a much-abused orphan in the slums.
She was raised by someone she calls "Grandpa", who came down from the upper levels to the slums.
There seem to be more to Grandpa's life in the upper levels and his death than what meets the eye.
After miraculously surviving the Punishing Virus epidemic, Karenina was made into a Construct after she was rescued.

Title: No.006
Content: \nKarenina would never admit it, but she will never stand idly by the side when Lucia and Gray Raven are in danger.\nHer harsh words belie how fond she is of her friends.

Title: No.001
Content:
Leader of the Forsaken. Attacker-type.
An expert with twin blades, Watanabe is able to quickly and silently approach the enemy to score a stealthy kill.

Title: No.002
Content:
Much loved and respected by the Forsaken.
Watanabe named the Forsaken headquarters as "Oasis".
He considers the Forsaken to be his family, and is committed to protecting the home of the Forsaken.

Title: No.003
Content:
Former Construct of Babylonia and an elite member of the Execution Squad.
After coming into conflict with the decision-makers of Babylonia, he removed his own Inver-Device and traveled to Earth with only minimum protection against the virus.
He gathered the humans and Constructs that have been left behind on Earth, and in time they came to be called the Forsaken.

Title: No.004
Content:
"The world I want is one that is fair and peaceful."

As a dissident of Babylonia, Watanabe's suspicions were confirmed when he came to Earth and saw for himself the lives of the humans and Constructs left behind.
His opinion of Babylonia seems to have improved slightly after encountering Gray Raven.

Title: No.005
Content:
Watanabe's Consciousness comes from a Reserve Army soldier on Earth. He had met Bianca when she was a human.
During the Punishing outbreak, he hesitated to open fire on the Corrupted priest who seemed to have retained a modicum of reason.
This was one of the reasons why Bianca had to kill her foster father with her own hands.

Title: No.006
Content:
As a Construct, Watanabe has become more mature and determined.
He is willing to abandon everything, and protect everything.
As the leader of the Forsaken, he is taking them towards a future that he believes in.

Title: No.001
Content: \nNew frame provisioned from Babylonia for the purpose of rescuing Kamui.\nFollowing their new-look leader, Gray Raven goes forth.

Title: No.002
Content: \nWeight reduced by 10%, increasing explosiveness. New weapon storage points have also been added.

Title: No.003
Content: \nThe two condensers gather electrons in the atmosphere, supporting Lucia with electrical power.

Title: No.004
Content: \nCreates an electric field that supplies energy to the entire team.

Title: No.005
Content: \nFeeling more for the commandant than a simple superior and subordinate relationship, but finding it difficult to seek the answer.

Title: No.006
Content:
"Does this hairstyle suit me?"
The hairstyle of Lucia's new frame seems to be troubling her.
Perhaps all she seeks is a word of approval from the commandant.

Title: No.001
Content: \nLiv's new frame was customized by the commandant of Egret, Liv's previous squad.

Title: No.002
Content: \nLiv cut her own hair as a sign of her determination to break with the past, asserting her identity as Liv of Gray Raven.

Title: No.003
Content: \nThe change in frame did not signify a change in Liv's character. It is her attitude that has changed.

Title: No.004
Content: \nIn order to become more useful in battle, Liv has initiated a training program that puts great pressure not just on herself, but on the commandant as well.\nHer zealousness seems to have become something of a headache for the commandant.

Title: No.005
Content: \nLiv wants to work hard, to be more useful to the commandant, to remain in Gray Raven, by the side of its commandant. The change in frame has only made her feelings all the more intense.

Title: No.006
Content: \nLiv finally understood her commandant's words.\nShe does not need to carry everything by herself. Her commandant and her comrades are there for her.

Title: No.001
Content: \nThe new frame that the commandant of Gray Raven provisioned for Karenina is more than just a new look, it also awakens a new attack mode for her hand cannon.

Title: No.002
Content: \nFires a continuous thermal wave from the nozzle. Can be used as a powerful blade that cuts through any matter.

Title: No.003
Content: \nThe frame is made from the newest prism sheet, while the build-in optical receiver makes charging convenient and quick. Its weaponry has also been upgraded to a high-speed levi-gun.

Title: No.004
Content: \nKarenina would never say it, but she is very happy about the look of her new frame.

Title: No.005
Content: \nKarenina was a major contributor in Gray Raven's construction of the above-ground facility.\nDespite her constant complaints, it was abundantly clear that she was enjoying it.

Title: No.006
Content: \nThe new frame has made her even more competitive. Added to her existing obsession for Lucia is a newfound obsession for the commandant.

Title: No.001
Content: \nBrand-new frame compiled from Liv's memories and data recovered from ancient ruins. The pure white outfit seems almost sacred.

Title: No.002
Content: \nSpecial levitation devices on the feet and jet boosters on the back give Liv great mobility.

Title: No.003
Content: \nBoth levi-guns have been upgraded, with improved firepower and the ability to self-duplicate in a special mode.

Title: No.004
Content: \nShe can release nano-particles from her skirt, repairing damage taken by allies.

Title: No.005
Content: \nThe new frame is so eye-catching that, for a long while, Liv felt reluctant to show herself in front of the others.

Title: No.006
Content: \nThe mission at the church allowed Liv to finally show her love for her new frame and tell the commandant her true feelings.

Title: No.001
Content: \nTenebrion has transformed this frame.\nThe heavy armor does not simply protect it from external threat, it also holds back the dangerous power within.

Title: No.002
Content: \nAble to toggle between Bastion and Tenebrion modes to perform different attacks.

Title: No.003
Content: \nTenebrion enables powerful attacks, but the energy feedback will eventually overwhelm the user if used for an extended period.

Title: No.004
Content: \nThe power of Tenebrion is gradually strengthening and changing Kamui.

Title: No.005
Content: \nCamu's existence, who the "real" Kamui is, and where Kamui actually came from are all still unsolved mysteries.

Title: No.006
Content: \nKamui and Camu sometimes discuss which personality the commandant sees in him.

Title: No.001
Content: \nDesigned to more effectively leverage Lee's computing powers. Produced in the same batch as Kamui's frame.

Title: No.002
Content: \nThe upgraded perception module enables Lee to control trajectory with even greater precision, resulting in highly accurate fire.

Title: No.003
Content: \nThe new anchor lock-on ability enables quick identification and tracking of the enemy in combination with Lee's computing powers.

Title: No.004
Content: \nThe new frame prioritizes Lee's computing module efficiency, enabling the most precise computations within a matter of microseconds.

Title: No.005
Content: \nLee's talent in repair and assembly has blossomed, resulting in successful modification of Construct frames.

Title: No.006
Content: \nHas made a series of ever-advancing botlets for the commandant, which the commandant uses as alarm clocks.

Title: No.001
Content: \nHigh-mobility frame of Nanami's own design.\nWeight has been further reduced, resulting in unparalleled speed in combination with IR-005 propulsion wheels.

Title: No.002
Content: \nThe inspiration came about when Nanami came across a video of a roller-skating competition in the database.\nShe was immediately drawn to the participants' quick and agile movements.

Title: No.003
Content: \nThe sight of Nanami dashing across the battlefield with her new frame catches everybody's eye.

Title: No.004
Content: \nWith more powerful and flexible arms, a supercharged engine, and a revolutionary propulsion wheel design, Nanami's new frame delivers staggering performance.

Title: No.005
Content: \nThe holder on her leg is for Nanami's precious digital diary.

Title: No.006
Content: \nThe first entry in the Diary of Important Things starts with the commandant.

Title: No.001
Content: \nOnly participates in important operations.\nOften operates separately from other Ascendants.

Title: No.002
Content: \nThe Punishing Virus contributes to little of her prowess.

Title: No.003
Content: \nNot interested in weak foes or unnecessary slaughter.\nOften leaves mundane tasks and cleanup duties to Roland and Gabriel.

Title: No.004
Content: \nThe sheath on her belt can also be used as a weapon or support.\nIts size can adapt to the shape of the blade.

Title: No.005
Content: \nHas been observing the commandant of Gray Raven for a long time.\nHer attitude towards Lucia of Gray Raven has changed.

Title: No.006
Content: \nThings have been a little tense between the sisters since their reunion.\nLuna is finding it hard to understand her sister's thoughts.

Title: No.001
Content: \nA frame specially designed to control spacecraft. It was used by Watanabe when he served in the Task Force.

Title: No.002
Content: \nIts streamlined design and special composite materials can minimize air resistance, reflect and absorb electromagnetic waves, and reduce heat radiation.

Title: No.003
Content: \nSpecially-designed, the dual blades can unleash nanoscale air pulses through particle vibration to destroy targets on a molecular level.

Title: No.004
Content: \nIn order to enhance its performance in the mission on the space station, Babylonia has further upgraded its mobility and added a visually dynamic stealth function module to it.

Title: No.005
Content:
It is not only a proof of cooperation between Babylonia and Forsaken on the space station, but also a frame that represents Watanabe's past.
After the mission, Babylonia gave it to Watanabe to show sincerity for cooperation.
Persuaded by the commandant, Watanabe reluctantly accepted the frame.

Title: No.006
Content: \n"Power is nothing without the just means."\nThough the operation on the space station did not change Watanabe's views on Babylonia, he sees Gray Raven's acts as the just way of wielding power.

Title: No.001
Content: \nAn Archaeological Team member, Tank-type Construct.\nShe wields a great scythe as her weapon. Because her frame is relatively vulnerable, she defends herself through her scythe's high-performance transformation modules. Her attacks are valiant and dashing, amazing anyone to lay eyes on them.

Title: No.002
Content: \nCombat is not her main duty. The equipment and systems installed in her frame are not purely for combat, but also for virus protection, surveying, and analysis during an archaeological expedition.\nAs an all-rounded Construct, she can quickly adapt to a variety of unknown environments.

Title: No.003
Content: \nHer skirt is not merely a skirt, but also a piece of equipment for combat purposes.\nAs the scythe is a heavy weapon, a great sense of balance is required for the user to stay on their feet. The skirt is a balancing system and functions as counterweights.

Title: No.004
Content:
"This world needs more colors!"
Always confident, infectiously optimistic, and unbelievable empathic, Ayla is welcomed like a superstar everywhere.
Wherever she goes, her voluminous charm catches people's eyes.

Title: No.005
Content: \nShe is part of the "new blood" living in Babylonia since birth. Affected by her best friend Selena, she willingly became a Construct.\nBrave-tinted Ayla is a true seeker, a seeker of worldly tones and hues within this cosmos, and she would even cast her entire life for them.

Title: No.006
Content:
Ayla might seem outgoing and open, but her heart is a door shut tight. Few truly understand her, and fewer are her true friends.
But for her true friends, Ayla will give even her life without thinking.
Ayla has never, and will never think of abandoning Selena.

Title: No.001
Content: \nAn experimental frame illegally created by Daedalus. Even though the modification technology applied to it is immature, its performance remains top-class.

Title: No.002
Content: \nThe frame has an enhanced visual module that enables Bianca to catch fast-moving targets even while sniping from afar. In close-range combat, she can use the module to swiftly pinpoint enemy weaknesses.

Title: No.003
Content: \nThe frame can create ion beams through electric potential difference generated by its internal energy bank, thereby controlling the positive and negative charge movements to create lightning for attacking enemies. When all frame restrictions are removed, it can even change the weather in a certain area to cause thunder strikes.

Title: No.004
Content: \nThe Science Council has upgraded and repaired the frame, but due to Daedalus' immature Construct technology, extended usage of this frame can still cause deviations for Bianca's consciousness model over time.

Title: No.005
Content: \nBianca kept this frame in good shape to remind herself to never forget the past.

Title: No.006
Content: \nIn truth, Bianca quite enjoyed the time she spent with others while using this frame, such as a certain trade offer and a certain gathering.

Title: No.001
Content:
"My name is Sophia. I come for the benefit of Akdilek Commercial Alliance."
A temporary member of Gray Raven. Support type. Skilled at firearms CQC and emergency repairs.
To bring the Eternal Engine to its true terminal station, she has temporarily joined Gray Raven as an Akdilek Commercial Alliance envoy to learn everything she can.
Her loyalty to her master impresses anyone she meets.

Title: No.002
Content: \n"System all green, ready to engage."\nBy adopting a full-coverage design, this frame provides exceptional mobility, helping Sophia speed through tiny spaces that others might find it hard to squeeze in. The robotic arms are linked to her M.I.N.D. with a sync rate reaching 99.78%, meaning that Sophia can control these arms without delay.

Title: No.003
Content: \nSophia's consciousness came from an orphan abandoned in the refuse collection carriage of Asslam. Without a name and parents, this little girl, known as Hyena, managed to survive and became one of the train technicians of Akdilek.

Title: No.004
Content: \n"Thanks... I will treasure it as much as I treasure my tools..."\nDuring one repair mission, the repair team got caught up in an accident. They decided to bring the youngest girl back to the train even if it would cost them their lives. Having accidentally fallen into the hands of the aristocrats, Sophia was modified into a Construct and became their tool.""

Title: No.005
Content: \n"You're nice to me... Just like Jamilah."\nAt the night of the aristocrats' usurpatory scheme, Sophia came to the carriage of the leader of Akdilek. What happened that night remains unknown, but ever since then, a petite guard can be seen near Jamilah's side.

Title: No.006
Content: \nAfter protecting Asslam with Gray Raven, Jamilah has forged an official alliance with Babylonia. As an envoy of Akdilek Commercial Alliance, Sophia has left for Babylonia to provide assistance and expand her knowledge. She regularly brings Helium-3 collected by Babylonia to Asslam as train fuel.

Title: No.001
Content: \n"Commandant, I would like to confirm some details about the mission this time. Do you have the time now?" Leader of Strike Hawk, Tank-type. He is proficient in all weapons but prefers scythes. Temporarily visiting Gray Raven for a special co-op mission. Always tries to do his best in all tasks.

Title: No.002
Content: \nHas a special Inver-Device installed in his frame that allows him to take only the bare minimum orders from any Commandant. Always plans ahead for any mission and prepares multiple response plans to ensure his teammates can return safely.

Title: No.003
Content: \nAs members of a scout squad that always acts individually, Chrome and other teammates use an exclusive stable, interference-free channel to exchange their locations, statuses, and other voice messages over long range.

Title: No.004
Content: \nFormerly known as "Langston", he wanted to become a Commandant when he was a human, but an accident shut the door on him. He then voluntarily applied to become a Construct and is now serving as the leader of Strike Hawk.

Title: No.005
Content: \nWhen Chrome first became a Construct, he was often seen as an incapable pretty boy who only got promoted through political influence. However, he soon demonstrated outstanding capabilities that shut off all the accusations.

Title: No.006
Content: \n"A leader must always set high standards for himself both in battles and in a spiritual way." Always places high standards on himself. Prioritizes others around him in all situations and chooses to take on all the problems on his own.

Title: No.001
Content: \nBPL-01GR, code name Plume. Developed from all the available combat records of Gray Raven, this frame is flexible against all sorts of enemies, but the emphasis on burst power makes it somewhat unstable.

Title: No.002
Content: \nAs the chief developer of this frame, Asimov had Nikola's permission to use the available data of Alpha, along with other observation records. As a result, this frame was closer to the "original" Lucia rather than that of Gray Raven.

Title: No.003
Content: \nAfter the battle in Kowloong City, she imported all the memory data of Lucia, including Alpha's. However, it is worth noting that Plume is not the same Lucia as everybody knew.

Title: No.004
Content: \nThe additional thrusters installed on legs and back provide Plume with exceptional instantaneous acceleration and allow her to make sophisticated moves. The back thrusters can even be removed and used as weapons.

Title: No.005
Content: \nApart from blades, the original design could also be connected to external energy containers and use long-range weapons. This feature was not implemented on the actual frame, however.

Title: No.006
Content: \nThe first prototype Construct ever built for Babylonia's mid-term military Construct development plan.
